page.title: 16New Southgate
page.content: Our school is situated in New Southgate. There are two Southgates. One is the original Old Southgate and ours is the later development. Most of the houses in our area are quite old. The average age is about 100 years. In some places the houses were so old they were forming 'slum areas'and had to be pulled down. There are quite a few new developments in our area, mostly taking the form of council estates. A council estate is built by the government and the dwellings are rented out to the tenants. We also have a number of 'sky_rise' blocks of flats. Some are as high as 30 floors. We have local shops and services and two stations are located in our area; New Southgate main line and Arnos Grove underground. We also have plenty of buses serving the area.
